text:
@realDonaldTrump @GregAbbott_TX 7th generation Texan here @realDonaldTrump @GregAbbott_TX 
Make no mistake about it - opening up Texas this soon, there will be a second wave and you two, will be solely responsible for all those deaths. #ProfitsOverPeople #SoTexas #coronavirus
